title: java版错误求解
author: fym123
txt_content:
Couldn't load luncher core from C:\program files（x86）\Minecraft\game\laucher.dll:loaderrornotpresent
确定又提示Unable to start the Minecraft Runtime Environment.This is most likely caused by a corruption.Please try to reinstall Minecraft.
文件夹只有启动器和game文件夹，game里面空的，啥也没有了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
建议别用正版启动器吧，这个英文是要你尝试重新安装。

别的启动器也能正版登录，没有区别，https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-142335-1-1.html
